title: Do we recite the 3 quls after sunnah prayers?
transcript:
what are the mu'awwizat with that they are the 
last three chapters of the Quran known as the last   three why because they begin with so the Sunnah is 
to recite each once after all five daily prayers   oh can we recite them after voluntary prayers 
the Sunnah prayers nope only after the fard   you don't mention them after Salah [Al-Janaza] 
the funeral prayer or [rawaatib] the voluntary   highly emphatic recommended prayers or The witr 
Etc these are only for the five daily prayers
